short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to navigate to the homepage of the current website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate to the Homepage with Ease! This simple yet powerful Chrome extension allows you to instantly redirect any website to its homepage with just a single click on the extension icon. Whether you're deep within a site's subpages or simply want a quick way to return to the homepage without navigating through the site's menu, our 'Go to Homepage' extension is the perfect tool for you. It's lightweight, efficient, and works seamlessly across all your favorite websites
